name: Souls Of Shadows
description:
Assemble the magic circle to summon the witches and push back the darkness! But beware the shadow demons who hunt you.

Created in two weeks for the '2021 Indie Horror Jam': https://itch.io/jam/indie-horror-jam

Art by BrendaB

Sound by Fokai

3D models by Skareeg

Programmed by LazyNorth
